title: Purchasing rp
body: Is there a way for you to use and 10$ prepaid card in other countries, I live in the US and have an account in Brazil, is there a way I could put rp on it with a prepaid card?

replies.body:
If you're talking about the Prepaid RP with League's logo and such, those are actually region specific. Meaning, if the card was bought in the US it will only work on the NA region. 

If that prepaid card is more like the Visa Gift Cards, then that should work as normal regardless of what country you're in!
